history.text: Hi, Have you seen the Marvel's Avengers? Its pretty good.
No I keep meaning to see it.
It has big stars like Robert Downey Jr and Chris Evans.
I love Chris Evans. There are a few sequels right?
It is a very well received superhero movie with above 92% rotten tomatoes rating
Are you into these types of movies/
Yes I am very much into these types of movies, specially from Marvel.
Who is the villain?
Thor's brother Loki is the villain
Is Iron Man the main character?
He is one of the main characters, Yes.
Is Scarlett Johansson a villain?
The plot revolves around loki and a powerful weapon called tesseract that could potentially destroy the earth.
So I am assuming they save the earth?
Scarlett Johansson plays Black widow who is one of the Avengers and not a villain
Yes, they all team up to save the earth.
Is it all the same characters for each sequel?
I don't know about that but did you know that this movie got a cinema score of A+
No I didn't. I have never heard of this director before. Has he directed anything else?
During the movie at some point the Avengers gets divided in how they'll approach Loki and save the earth.
S.H.I.E.L.D. is this the agency they belong to?
Joss whedon is the director of this movie and it is one of the parts of Marvel Cinematics.
Yes, SHIELD recruits everyone.
Nick fury is the leader of SHIELD
Samuel Jackson is in it too?
Yes, Samuel Jackson plays Nick Fury, who is the leader of S.H.I.E.L.D
Mark Ruffalo plays HULK, who often remains calm but when angered, turns into the HULK.
Does Samuel Jackson die in this movie?
I don't know about that but this movie got very good reviews from the critics and they applauded joss whedon's direction and writing skills.
Do you like movies from this genre ?
Not usually. But this one looks good. When it has good ratings then I am more apt to see it like this one does.
Yes, this one has wonderful ratings across all critics.
Looks like this movie takes place in New York City
Yes, The Avengers save the New York City in this movie
Do you agree with this movies ratings ?
Yes I do. I know my husband thought this was a great movie.
Wow, that's great. What did he like about this movie ?
He is definitely a Marvel guy. Loves action movies.
When you watch the movie, note that the movie is very action heavy.
Yes I am assuming there is a ton of fighting
I really liked the scene where Nick fury uses one of the SHIELD members death to motivate the Avengers in coming and working together.
It looks like they do get divided at one point.
Yes, they do when they decide an approach on how to defeat Loki, the team divides for a period of time.
